attributes.action: Remove the Page '(Controversial Humour) Dead Baby Jokes' from Facebook
attributes.additional_details: By gathering signatures for the page (Controversial Humour) Dead Baby Jokes',  we are hoping that Facebook will sit up and take notice of decent people who find the Dead baby Jokes page offensive.  There has been a very big reaction to the page but Facebook refuse to remove even though the material on it is extremely offensive, and the amount of bullying and nasty comments made to those who oppose the page is quite scary.  We are hoping that raising the issue with the e-petition, that perhaps someone in the Government will help our cause
